mapper.select: SELECT nickname, username FROM t_user WHERE department_id = (select department_id from t_user where username = #{userAccount}) ORDER BY id;
select code from t_department where id = (select department_id from t_user where username = #{userAccount});
select department_title from t_user where username = #{userAccount};

select create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, address, avatar, description, email, mobile, nickname, password, sex, status, type, username, del_flag, department_id, street, pass_strength, department_title, birth, open_status from t_user where id = #{id}
mapper.insert: insert into t_user(create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, address, avatar, description, email, mobile, nickname, password, sex, status, type, username, del_flag, department_id, street, pass_strength, department_title, birth, open_status) values (#{create_by}, #{create_time}, #{update_by}, #{update_time}, #{address}, #{avatar}, #{description}, #{email}, #{mobile}, #{nickname}, #{password}, #{sex}, #{status}, #{type}, #{username}, #{del_flag}, #{department_id}, #{street}, #{pass_strength}, #{department_title}, #{birth}, #{open_status})

insert into t_user( create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, address, avatar, description, email, mobile, nickname, password, sex, status, type, username, del_flag, department_id, street, pass_strength, department_title, birth, open_status) values
(#{entity.create_by}, #{entity.create_time}, #{entity.update_by}, #{entity.update_time}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.avatar}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.mobile}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.del_flag}, #{entity.department_id}, #{entity.street}, #{entity.pass_strength}, #{entity.department_title}, #{entity.birth}, #{entity.open_status})

insert into t_user( create_by, create_time, update_by, update_time, address, avatar, description, email, mobile, nickname, password, sex, status, type, username, del_flag, department_id, street, pass_strength, department_title, birth, open_status) values
(#{entity.create_by}, #{entity.create_time}, #{entity.update_by}, #{entity.update_time}, #{entity.address}, #{entity.avatar}, #{entity.description}, #{entity.email}, #{entity.mobile}, #{entity.nickname}, #{entity.password}, #{entity.sex}, #{entity.status}, #{entity.type}, #{entity.username}, #{entity.del_flag}, #{entity.department_id}, #{entity.street}, #{entity.pass_strength}, #{entity.department_title}, #{entity.birth}, #{entity.open_status})
on duplicate key update create_by = values(create_by), create_time = values(create_time), update_by = values(update_by), update_time = values(update_time), address = values(address), avatar = values(avatar), description = values(description), email = values(email), mobile = values(mobile), nickname = values(nickname), password = values(password), sex = values(sex), status = values(status), type = values(type), username = values(username), del_flag = values(del_flag), department_id = values(department_id), street = values(street), pass_strength = values(pass_strength), department_title = values(department_title), birth = values(birth), open_status = values(open_status)
mapper.update:
update t_user
create_by = #{create_by},
create_time = #{create_time},
update_by = #{update_by},
update_time = #{update_time},
address = #{address},
avatar = #{avatar},
description = #{description},
email = #{email},
mobile = #{mobile},
nickname = #{nickname},
password = #{password},
sex = #{sex},
status = #{status},
type = #{type},
username = #{username},
del_flag = #{del_flag},
department_id = #{department_id},
street = #{street},
pass_strength = #{pass_strength},
department_title = #{department_title},
birth = #{birth},
open_status = #{open_status},
where id = #{id}
